data.title: Building Automation Control Systems
data.meta_description: Piedmont Service Group provides building automation control systems throughout the Rocky Mountains and Southwest US into Washington DC. Call now!
data.text:
Building Controls

Full Service Controls Company

Through our controls division, CMS Controls (formerly Automated Facility Solutions), we have provided hundreds of installations across the Carolinas and Virginia with proven cost effective energy saving designs. From building automation, thermal imaging, lighting controls, and systems integration, we have a solution for every type of facility.

Our focus is to design and maintain a building automation system that maximizes the utility consumption in our customer's facilities. CMSâ€™s systems provide an interactive graphical interface which allows any operator to easily access and fine tune their system for precise control.

With industry leading communication protocols, LonMark, BACnet, MODBUS, to name a few, CMS can provide the products which allow integration to any of your facilities systems with just a touch of a button.

We are a complete provider for the following controls components and can also work on all other controls systems:
